ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: I have no idea, though it seems to me Mithril trades better than Lambent, but that is WAYYYYY beyond me... Your question reminded me of one I meant to ask.  I
ygData.messageBody:
I have no idea, though it seems to me Mithril trades better than
Lambent, but that is WAYYYYY beyond me...

Your question reminded me of one I meant to ask. I was offered these
earrings (I forgot the name) AC2 +5 CHA for 25 a piece. I ended up
buying 2 for 40P. DId I get hosed? They seemed great to me, but so did
the crude stien, before I realized how easy it was to get...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
